verses.t: Then{G1161} said he{G2036} unto{G4314} the disciples{G3588}, It is{G2076} impossible{G418} but{G3361} that offences{G3588} will come{G2064}: but{G1161} woe{G3759} unto him, through{G1223} whom{G3739} they come{G2064}!

It were better{G3081} for him{G846} that{G1487} a millstone{G3458} were hanged{G4029} about{G4012} his{G846} neck{G3588}, and{G2532} he cast{G4496} into{G1519} the sea{G3588}, than{G2228} that{G2443} he should offend{G4624} one{G1520} of these{G5130} little ones{G3398}.

Take heed{G4337} to yourselves{G1438}: If{G1437} thy{G4675} brother{G3588} trespass{G264} against{G1519} thee{G4571}, rebuke{G2008} him{G846}; and{G2532} if{G1437} he repent{G3340}, forgive{G863} him{G846}.

And{G2532} if{G1437} he trespass{G264} against{G1519} thee{G4571} seven times{G2034} in a day{G3588}, and{G2532} seven times{G2034} in a day{G3588} turn again{G1994} to{G1909} thee{G4571}, saying{G3004}, I repent{G3340}; thou shalt forgive{G863} him{G846}.
And{G2532} the apostles{G3588} said{G2036} unto the Lord{G3588}, Increase{G4369} our{G2254} faith{G4102}.

And{G1161} the Lord{G3588} said{G2036}, If{G1487} ye had{G2192} faith{G4102} as{G5613} a grain{G2848} of mustard seed{G4615}, ye might say{G3004} unto this{G3778} sycamine tree{G4807}, Be thou plucked up by the root{G1610}, and{G2532} be thou planted{G5452} in{G1722} the sea{G3588}; and{G2532} it should obey{G5219} you{G5213}.

But{G1161} which{G5101} of{G1537} you{G5216}, having{G2192} a servant{G1401} plowing{G722} or{G2228} feeding cattle{G4165}, will say{G2046} unto him{G3739} by and by{G2046}, when he is come{G1525} from{G1537} the field{G3588}Go{G3928} and sit down to meat{G377}?

And{G235} will{G2046} not rather{G3780} say{G2046} unto him{G846}, Make ready{G2090} wherewith{G5101} I may sup{G1172}, and{G2532} gird thyself{G4024}, and serve{G1247} me{G3427}, till{G2193} I have eaten{G5315} and{G2532} drunken{G4095}; and{G2532} afterward{G3326} thou{G4771} shalt eat{G5315} and{G2532} drink{G4095}?
Doth he{G2192} thank{G5485} that{G1565} servant{G3588} because{G3754} he did{G4160} the things that{G3588} were commanded{G1299} him{G846}? I trow{G1380} not{G3756}.

So{G3779} likewise{G2532} ye{G5210}, when{G3752} ye shall have done{G4160} all{G3956} those things which{G3588} are commanded{G1299} you{G5213}, say{G3004}, We are{G2070} unprofitable{G888} servants{G1401}: we have done{G4160} that which{G3739} was our duty{G3784} to do{G4160}.UNSURE: Tagging of "hoti"

And{G2532} it came to pass{G1096}, as{G1722} he{G846} went{G4198} to{G1519} Jerusalem{G2419}, that{G2532} he{G846} passed{G1330} through{G1223} the midst{G3319} of Samaria{G4540} and{G2532} Galilee{G1056}.
And{G2532} as he{G846} entered{G1525} into{G1519} a certain{G5100} village{G2968}, there met{G528} him{G846} ten{G1176} men{G435} that were lepers{G3015}, which{G3739} stood{G2476} afar off{G4207}:
And{G2532} they{G846} lifted up{G142} their voices{G5456}, and said{G3004}, Jesus{G2424}, Master{G1988}, have mercy{G1653} on us{G2248}.

And{G2532} when he saw{G1492} them, he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Go{G4198} shew{G1925} yourselves{G1438} unto the priests{G3588}. And{G2532} it came to pass, that{G1096}, as{G1722} they went{G5217}, they{G846} were cleansed{G2511}.
And{G1161} one{G1520} of{G1537} them{G846}, when he saw{G1492} that{G3754} he was healed{G2390}, turned back{G5290}, and with{G3326} a loud{G3173} voice{G5456} glorified{G1392} God{G3588},
And{G2532} fell down{G4098} on{G1909} his face{G4383} at{G3844} his{G846} feet{G3588}, giving{G2168} him{G846} thanks{G2168}: and{G2532} he{G846} was{G2258} a Samaritan{G4541}.
And{G1161} Jesus{G3588} answering{G611} said{G2036}, Were there{G2511} not{G3780} ten{G1176} cleansed{G2511}? but{G1161} where{G4226} are the nine{G1767}?
There are{G2147} not{G3756} found{G2147} that returned{G5290} to give{G1325} glory{G1391} to God{G3588}, save{G1487} this{G3778} stranger{G241}.
And{G2532} he said{G2036} unto him{G846}, Arise{G450}, go thy way{G4198}: thy{G4675} faith{G3588} hath made{G4982} thee{G4571} whole{G4982}.

And{G1161} when he was demanded{G1905} of{G5259} the Pharisees{G3588}, when{G4219} the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} should come{G2064}, he answered{G611} them{G846} and{G2532} said{G2036}, The kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} cometh{G2064} not{G3756} with{G3326} observation{G3907}:
Neither{G3761} shall they say{G2046}, Lo{G2400} here{G5602}! or{G2228}, lo{G2400} there{G1563}! for{G1063}, behold{G2400}, the kingdom{G3588} of God{G3588} is{G2076} within{G1787} you{G5216}.

And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto{G4314} the disciples{G3588}, The days{G2250} will come{G2064}, when{G3753} ye shall desire{G1937} to see{G1492} one{G1520} of the days{G3588} of the Son{G3588} of man{G3588}, and{G2532} ye shall{G3700} not{G3756} see{G3700} it.
And{G2532} they shall say{G2046} to you{G5213}, See{G2400} here{G5602}; or{G2228}, see{G2400} there{G1563}: go{G565} not{G3361} after{G565} them, nor{G3366} follow{G1377} them.

For{G1063} as{G5618} the lightning{G3588}, that lighteneth{G797} out of{G1537} the one{G3588} part under{G5259} heaven{G3772}, shineth{G2989} unto{G1519} the other{G3588} part under{G5259} heaven{G3772}; so{G3779} shall{G2071} also{G2532} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} be{G2071} in{G1722} his{G846} day{G3588}.
But{G1161} first{G4412} must{G1163} he{G846} suffer{G3958} many things{G4183}, and{G2532} be rejected{G593} of{G575} this{G3778} generation{G3588}.
And{G2532} as{G2531} it was{G1096} in{G1722} the days{G3588} of Noe{G3575}, so{G3779} shall it be{G2071} also{G2532} in{G1722} the days{G3588} of the Son{G3588} of man{G3588}.

They did eat{G2068}, they drank{G4095}, they married wives{G1060}, they were given in marriage{G1547}, until{G891} the day{G2250} that{G3739} Noe{G3575} entered{G1525} into{G1519} the ark{G3588}, and{G2532} the flood{G3588} came{G2064}, and{G2532} destroyed{G622} them all{G537}.

Likewise{G3668} also{G2532} as{G5613} it was{G1096} in{G1722} the days{G3588} of Lot{G3091}; they did eat{G2068}, they drank{G4095}, they bought{G59}, they sold{G4453}, they planted{G5452}, they builded{G3618};

But{G1161} the same day{G2250} that{G3739} Lot{G3091} went{G1831} out{G575} of Sodom{G4670} it rained{G1026} fire{G4442} and{G2532} brimstone{G2303} from{G575} heaven{G3772}, and{G2532} destroyed{G622} them all{G537}.
Even{G2596} thus{G5024} shall it be{G2071} in{G3739} the day{G2250} when{G601} the Son{G3588} of man{G3588} is revealed{G601}.NOTE! Extra word: "tauta"

In{G1722} that{G1565} day{G3588}, he which{G3739} shall be{G2071} upon{G1909} the housetop{G3588}, and{G2532} his{G846} stuff{G3588} in{G1722} the house{G3588}, let him{G2597} not{G3361} come down{G2597} to take{G142} it{G846} away{G142}: and{G2532} he that is{G3588} in{G1722} the field{G3588}, let him{G1994} likewise{G3668} not{G3361} return{G1994} back{G3694}.
Remember{G3421} Lot's{G3091} wife{G3588}.
Whosoever{G3739} shall seek{G2212} to save{G4982} his{G846} life{G3588} shall lose{G622} it{G846}; and{G2532} whosoever{G3739} shall lose{G622} his life{G846} shall preserve{G2225} it{G846}.

I tell{G3004} you{G5213}, in that{G3778} night{G3588} there shall be{G2071} two{G1417} men in{G1909} one{G1520} bed{G2825}; the one{G1520} shall be taken{G3880}, and{G2532}the other{G2087} shall be left{G863}.
Two{G1417} women shall be{G2071} grinding{G229} together{G846}; the one{G1520} shall be taken{G3880}, and{G2532} the other{G2087} left{G863}.
Two men shall be in the field; the one shall be taken, and the other left.NOTE! I take it that we are here in keeping with the omitted text.

And{G2532} they answered{G611} and said{G3004} unto him{G846}, Where{G4226}, Lord{G2962}? And{G1161} he said{G2036} unto them{G846}, Wheresoever{G3699} the body{G3588} is, thither{G1563} will{G4863} the eagles{G3588} be gathered together{G4863}.
